text: Ra tapa'ibhanda agadika paigambaraharula'i pani jhutha thahara'inthyo, tiniharule allahako tarphabata maddata na pugunjela, dhairyapurvaka inkara ra yatana sahane gardathe ra allahaka adesaharu kasaile parivartana garna saktaina. Ra tapa'ile paigambaraharuko sambandhama aghi nai thaha pa'isakeka chau
